tool_description: Extracts and generates metadata for each text chunk including position information, content characteristics, and relationships.

chunks.description: Array of text chunks to generate metadata for

chunk_positions.description: Starting positions of each chunk in the original text

include_content_stats.description: Whether to include content statistics in metadata

include_relationships.description: Whether to include chunk relationship information

error_messages: Empty original text: Provide non-empty original text for metadata extraction.
Empty chunks array: Provide at least one chunk for metadata generation.
Position array mismatch: Chunk positions array must have same length as chunks array.
Invalid positions: All chunk positions must be valid indices within the original text.
usage: Provide original_text, chunks, and chunk_positions arrays. Optionally configure metadata options and document_id. Returns metadata for each chunk.

chunk_metadata.description: JSON strings containing metadata for each chunk

metadata_fields.description: List of metadata fields included for each chunk
